title: Heat & Parking Included, Great Location!
posting_body: "Spacious, well maintained garden apartment (just 4 steps down) with Heat and 1 exterior parking space Included, in a quiet building with coin-laundry!
Great Elmwood Park location (Fullerton and 75th Ct), walking distance to the metra, restaurants and shopping.
Please note: 1) Solid Credit (675) Required; No Exceptions. 2) Cats considered; no dogs.
Call or text (847-347-3293) today and please indicate the address or intersection of the apartment of interest (Fullerton and 24th Ct); great places don't last long!
Raider Realty works all over Chicagoland, but our core areas are: Montclare, Dunning, Elmwood Park and River Grovegrove."
